title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Policy deletion enhancement
description:
,With this update,
admins with appropriate permissions can delete all associated alerts, cases,
and users in scope when deleting a policy to help quickly reset and remove
inactive policies. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various
signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as
IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management
enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies,
governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design,
users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit
logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
